summary: The document is a routing record sheet associated with the release of information under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details procedures for processing and forwarding documents, references a file named 'Peace Demonstrations', and includes materials from the Catholic Association for International Peace (CAIP) related to 'Negotiation Now!' and a conference titled 'Selective Conscientious Objection in an Age of Conflict'. Additionally, it notes that Oliver H. CORBUSTON received certain materials for cover purposes in a prior assignment.
key_findings: Document pertains to the release of records under the JFK Assassination Records Act of 1992.
References materials from the Catholic Association for International Peace (CAIP) on peace and conscientious objection.
Indicates that Oliver H. CORBUSTON received materials for cover purposes during a previous assignment.
Mentions a conference on 'Selective Conscientious Objection in an Age of Conflict' to be held in Washington, D.C.
